17 Oct 2014

bjacobel.com/activity

A couple weeks back I pushed out a new feature to the site: a live updating activity feed which shows what I’ve been working on recently.

It works by querying the GitHub API for my most recent commits and pushes to public repositiories. When I’m doing a bad job of keeping this blog up to date with what I’ve been working on (as I have recently), check out bjacobel.com/activity to check in.
